attributes.action: launch a public inquiry into the Parliamentary Fees Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the MP expenses scandal, it appears that the Fees Office was complicit in approving or failing to challenge large numbers of claims which appear to be improper. An internal inquiry into the Fees Offices would not suffice to satisfy the mood of the public - we need a full public inquiry into how they have allowed this situation to happen.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
